short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CallMiner category navigation and management tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your CallMiner v10 experience with this great productivity extension. You can quickly navigate through the sea of Categories and Attributes, which will tremendously shorten the amount of time you spend searching for what you need and redirect your focus to analyzing your call data. It even provide syntactic short cuts for common operators like OR,BEFORE etc.
